name: Riffin' Rockstar
description:
Giant bosses, metal riffs, and absolute chaos! 

Riffin' Rockstar is a platforming, rhythm-based, boss battler set in a steam punk dystopia.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

How To Play:

  • Enemies Shoot Projectiles To The Beat of The Music
    • Shoot projectiles with the matching attack to deal damage to the boss
    • Getting hit by projectiles causes damage to you
  • Alternate Projectiles
    • White projectiles cannot be destroyed and must be avoided
    • Lasers have a red indicator that highlights an incoming attack (run!)
  • Defeat Bosses
    • Bosses share a health bar with the player (bottom of screen)
      • Destroying projectiles increases the green side of the bar
      • Taking damage increases the red side
      • Keep the majority of the bar green when the song ends to win!
  • Quick Time Event Combos (QTEs)
    • At certain points during the song, there will be prompts for a QTE
      • Press the matching input shown on the screen
      • Correctly press 4 inputs in a row to trigger a special attack
      • The player cannot move during the QTE sequence
      • The player is invulnerable during the QTE sequence

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

  • Keyboard & Mouse
    • Spacebar - Jump
    • A - Move Left
    • D - Move Right
    • Shift - Sprint
    • Left Mouse: Blue Shot
    • Right Mouse: Red Shot
    • QTE Buttons: Z, Q, E, Space
  • Controller
    •  Left Stick - Move Left & RIght
    • A Button - Jump
    • Left Bumper - Sprint
    • Left Trigger - Blue Shot
    • Right Trigger - Red Shot
    • QTE Buttons: X, Y, B
